fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Enlargement, Energy, Youth, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Transport
eu_initiatives: international programs for the development of cross-cultural, scientific, educational and economic cooperation among citizens, organizations, institutions and companies both Polish and the counterparts abroad.
organisation_name: The Institute for Intercultural Communication and Interdisciplinary Studies SILK ROAD (IKMiSI SILK ROAD)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: The Institute for Intercultural Communication and Interdisciplinary Studies SILK ROAD is a Polish think tank, which was registered in March 2013. Our Institute is an independent, non – political and non-profit organization.
